tossup_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  The overall charge at the top and bottom, respectively, of a towering cumulonimbus cloud during a thunderstorm is:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) positive, positive
X) positive, negative
Y) negative, positive
Z) negative, negative
